content: Find doctors and hospitals .fragment_57023 { } Find a doctor Selecting a provider is easier when you know that they’ve been thoroughly vetted. That’s why we carefully review independent performance and quality data before admitting any provider into our network. Providers Doctors, hospitals, medical equipment, and specialty services Search for a participating provider by name, location, specialty, or medical procedure. 1 Learn more Pharmacies Search for an in-network pharmacy. Learn more Dental care Search for a participating dentist by name, location, or specialty. Learn more Vision care Locate a Davis Vision provider. 2 Learn more Facilities Where to go for care ER or urgent care? Know your options — before you need them. Learn more Urgent care Urgent Care Centers and Retail Health Clinics can be useful alternatives to visiting your doctor. Learn more Virtual visits Visit with a doctor anytime, anywhere through phone, video, mobile app. Learn more Ways to save on care Knowing how your health plan works and where to go when you need care can save you money on health care expenses. Learn more Care away from home Worldwide options If you’re traveling, it pays to make sure you’re covered wherever you roam. Learn more Guest membership Get medical coverage when you’re away from home. Learn more Get your ID card Need a new card? No problem. Log in at ibx.com to view/print your ID card. Log in Check a claim Find out the status of your claim. Log in at ibx.com to check the status of your claim. Log in 1 The provider tool includes information on all physicians, hospitals, and specialty service providers who participate in our managed care plans. Managed care products include Keystone HMO/POS , Personal Choice® PPO , national BlueCard® PPO, and our Medicare Advantage plans. 2 Vision benefits are administered by Davis Vision, an independent company. .fragment_57487 { .article-link-out { padding:0rem 2rem 1.8rem !important;} }

title: Contact Us | Independence Blue Cross (IBX)
content: Contact us Independence Blue Cross (IBX) | Independence Adminstrators Contact Independence Blue Cross (IBX) Members Members who have medical coverage under IBX can contact Customer Service with any questions. Customer Service Representatives are available 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., Monday – Friday. Call 1-800-ASK-BLUE TTY/TDD:711 Individuals and families Speak to a sales representative IBX sales representatives are available 8 a.m. to 8 p.m., Monday – Friday, to answer your questions and help you apply for coverage: Call 1-888-475-6206 TTY/TDD: 711 Visit Independence LIVE 1919 Market Street, 2nd Floor Philadelphia, PA 19103 8 a.m. to 4 p.m., Monday – Friday Medicare Visit IBX Medicare contact us page Call 1-800-645-3965 (TTY/TDD: 711) 8 a.m. to 8 p.m., seven days a week Employers Groups with 2-300 employees, call 1-800-444-6301 Groups with 300+ employees and national accounts, call 1-800-444-6301 Media relations IBX Newsroom Providers IBX contact information for providers page Brokers IBX Broker Care Center HIPAA Learn more about HIPAA privacy, security, and transactions, and how to submit inquiries: IBX HIPAA Report an incident of fraud If you suspect health care fraud, we urge you to report it. All reports are confidential. Complete the Fraud and Abuse Tip Referral Form Call 1-866-282-2707 TTY/TDD: 1-888-789-0429 The confidential anti-fraud and corporate compliance hotline is accessible 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., Monday - Friday. Learn more: IBX anti-fraud Contact Independence Administrators Members Call the phone number on your Independence Administrators ID card. Sales inquiries Speak to a sales representative Independence Administrators sales representatives are available to answer your questions: Call 1-888-356-7899 (TTY/TDD:711) Request a proposal Interested in receiving a proposal or more details about the solutions Independence Administrators provides? Send us a request for information or contact us today. Call 1-888-617-1010 Mail Independence Administrators at: Independence Administrators Attn: Sales Dept. 1900 Market Street Philadelphia, PA 19103 Submit an inquiry online: Request a proposal form Media relations Information for, and interview requests from, members of the media. title: Pennsylvania Health Insurance | Independence Blue Cross (IBX)
content: Coverage you can count on If you recently had a baby, got married, lost coverage, or moved, you may be eligible to enroll in a health plan See if you qualify Save time and money If it's not an emergency, skip the ER and use virtual care, retail clinics, or urgent care instead. See care options Keep yourself and your loved ones safe from measles IBX answers common questions about measles symptoms and navigating vaccine and testing coverage. Learn more Take care of your mental health IBX offers quality behavioral health services for members. Get into care that's right for you in as fast as 1 - 2 days. Individuals and families Get coverage for yourself and your loved ones. Go Medicare Get affordable Medicare health and prescription drug plans. Go Employers Get affordable, comprehensive coverage for your employees. Go Brokers Get to the information you need, fast. Go Providers Get tools and resources to provide care for your IBX patients. Go .fragment_35206 { } Staying healthy is both a journey and a destination We strive every day for your health and wellness, and we do it by giving you the resources you need to live every day better. .fragment_35207 { } Broad access Feel confident with the widest choice for quality care with more than 49,000 providers and 180 hospitals. Helpful tools Find a doctor, estimate your out-of-pocket costs, view your Personal Health Record or start your well-being profile. Wellness programs Take advantage of members-only offers on Indego bikes, skating, fitness classes, online programs, and more. Community focus Dedicated to the region, volunteering thousands of hours each year to over 75 non-profits. .fragment_35208 { } Supporting youth mental health through HeadFirst Independence Blue Cross (IBX), in collaboration with the Philadelphia Union Foundation and the Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine (PCOM), proudly supports HeadFirst, an initiative that prioritizes student-athletes' mental health. Watch this Know Your Mind video featuring experts from IBX, the Philadelphia Union Foundation, and PCOM to learn more. View video Revolutionizing health care through data science and partnerships In the second episode of IBX's Informatics series, IBX VP & Chief Analytics Officer Ravi Chawla, Data Science & Health Outcomes Research Director Dr. Aaron Smith-McLallen, and Wharton Professor Dr. Guy David explore the transformative role of data in improving health care delivery and outcomes. Learn more IBX launches Better Together campaign to combat loneliness Independence Blue Cross is addressing the rising loneliness epidemic with Better Together — a campaign that offers tools and resources that foster a culture of connection. Dr. Rich Snyder, IBX EVP and Chief Operating Officer, emphasizes the importance of building meaningful relationships to enhance mental, physical, and societal well-being. Learn more Transforming health care, every day Independence Blue Cross is transforming the delivery of health care in our region to make equity and affordability a reality for members, customers, and providers. Staying healthy is both a journey and a destination

We strive every day for your health and wellness, and we do it by giving you the resources you need to live every day better.

Broad access

Feel confident with the widest choice for quality care with more than 49,000 providers and 180 hospitals.

Helpful tools

Find a doctor, estimate your out-of-pocket costs, view your Personal Health Record or start your well-being profile.

Wellness programs

Take advantage of members-only offers on Indego bikes, skating, fitness classes, online programs, and more.

Community focus

Dedicated to the region, volunteering thousands of hours each year to over 75 non-profits.

Supporting youth mental health through HeadFirst

Independence Blue Cross (IBX), in collaboration with the Philadelphia Union Foundation and the Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine (PCOM), proudly supports HeadFirst, an initiative that prioritizes student-athletes' mental health. Watch this Know Your Mind video featuring experts from IBX, the Philadelphia Union Foundation, and PCOM to learn more.

View video

Revolutionizing health care through data science and partnerships

In the second episode of IBX's Informatics series, IBX VP & Chief Analytics Officer Ravi Chawla, Data Science & Health Outcomes Research Director Dr. Aaron Smith-McLallen, and Wharton Professor Dr. Guy David explore the transformative role of data in improving health care delivery and outcomes.

Learn more

IBX launches Better Together campaign to combat loneliness

Independence Blue Cross is addressing the rising loneliness epidemic with Better Together — a campaign that offers tools and resources that foster a culture of connection. Dr. Rich Snyder, IBX EVP and Chief Operating Officer, emphasizes the importance of building meaningful relationships to enhance mental, physical, and societal well-being.

Learn more

Transforming health care, every day

Independence Blue Cross is transforming the delivery of health care in our region to make equity and affordability a reality for members, customers, and providers.

Learn more

Independence Blue Cross is hiring!

We believe an inclusive workplace helps keep us vibrant, innovative, and passionate about what we do. Browse our open roles and apply to join our team.

Health insurance basics

Understanding health insurance

Health insurance basics

Independence Blue Cross simplifies health insurance, helping you understand how it works, how to choose a plan, and how to get the most from your plan.

The basics

Learn about the fundamentals of individual and family health insurance. This page helps answer your basic health insurance questions and provides informational videos.

Get started

What is an HMO?

Learn what an HMO insurance plan is and how it compares to other health plan types.

Learn more

What is a PPO?

Learn what a PPO health plan is and how it compares to other health plan types.

Learn more

What is an EPO?

Learn what an EPO Insurance plan is and if it’s a good fit for you and your family compared to an HMO or PPO.

Learn more

HMO vs. PPO

Deciding between an HMO and PPO health insurance plan? Learn the difference and find out which plan is right for you.

Learn more

How much does health insurance cost?

Health insurance costs explained: Learn what factors impact your costs in addition to your monthly premium.

Learn more

Health insurance terms

Basic health insurance terms explained. Refer to this list when you need help understanding the terms used in this section of ibx.com.

title: IBX health plans | Independence Blue Cross (IBX)
content: Individual and family health plans Ready to get covered? 1‑888‑475‑6206 Shop plans .fragment_51397 { } Shop and compare health insurance plans Open Enrollment ended January 15, 2025. The next Open Enrollment period begins November 1, 2025. If you missed the deadline, you may be able to enroll if you experience a qualifying life event. Learn more To choose a health plan, think about your health care needs, if your favorite providers are in the network, and how much you can afford. To enroll in an Independence Blue Cross (IBX) health plan, you must be a Pennsylvania resident and live in Bucks, Chester, Delaware, Montgomery, or Philadelphia County. IBX health plans Health plans Learn about our HMO, PPO, and EPO health plans and find one that fits your needs. View plans Health plan comparison chart Compare IBX health plan benefits and see what you’ll pay out-of-pocket for common in-network services. Compare plans Health savings account (HSA) Find out how you can manage the costs of qualified high-deductible health plans by opening an HSA. Learn more about HSAs Children’s Health Insurance Program (CHIP) Get information about CHIP, including details about eligibility and how to apply for coverage. Learn more about CHIP Low-income health plans Find information about Keystone First options for low-income individuals, including eligibility details and how to enroll. Learn more about low-income plans Dental plans Our dental plans fully cover routine exams and do not have a waiting period for preventive care, fillings, or extractions. Learn more about dental plans Vision plans Each of our vision plans includes fully covered routine vision exams. Compare plans to see which is right for you. Learn more about vision plans International health plans Get peace of mind for short or extended trips abroad with an international health insurance plan. Learn more about international health plans Accident, critical illness, and hospital recovery insurance Feel secure knowing you have financial support in the event of an accident, serious illness, or hospital stay. Learn about LifeSecure insurance plans We’re here to help 1-888-475-6206 (TTY: 711) 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., Monday – Friday ¿Cómo podemos ayudar? Llame 1-844-315-4884 (TTY: 711) Compare plans with our handy tool Discover which health plan is best for you based on your health needs and budget. Individual and family health plans
 Ready to get covered? 1‑888‑475‑6206  

Shop and compare health insurance plans

Open Enrollment ended January 15, 2025. The next Open Enrollment period begins November 1, 2025. If you missed the deadline, you may be able to enroll if you experience a qualifying life event.

Learn more

To choose a health plan, think about your health care needs, if your favorite providers are in the network, and how much you can afford. To enroll in an Independence Blue Cross (IBX) health plan, you must be a Pennsylvania resident and live in Bucks, Chester, Delaware, Montgomery, or Philadelphia County.

IBX health plans

Health plans

Learn about our HMO, PPO, and EPO health plans and find one that fits your needs.

View plans

Health plan comparison chart

Compare IBX health plan benefits and see what you’ll pay out-of-pocket for common in-network services.

Compare plans

Health savings account (HSA)

Find out how you can manage the costs of qualified high-deductible health plans by opening an HSA.

Learn more about HSAs

Children’s Health Insurance Program (CHIP)

Get information about CHIP, including details about eligibility and how to apply for coverage.

Learn more about CHIP

Low-income health plans

Find information about Keystone First options for low-income individuals, including eligibility details and how to enroll.

Learn more about low-income plans

Dental plans

Our dental plans fully cover routine exams and do not have a waiting period for preventive care, fillings, or extractions.

Learn more about dental plans

Vision plans

Each of our vision plans includes fully covered routine vision exams. Compare plans to see which is right for you.

Learn more about vision plans

International health plans

Get peace of mind for short or extended trips abroad with an international health insurance plan.

Learn more about international health plans

Accident, critical illness, and hospital recovery insurance

Feel secure knowing you have financial support in the event of an accident, serious illness, or hospital stay.

Learn about LifeSecure insurance plans

We’re here to help

1-888-475-6206 (TTY: 711) 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., Monday – Friday

¿Cómo podemos ayudar?
Llame 1-844-315-4884 (TTY: 711)

How to enroll Open enrollment Special enrollment Qualifying life events
FAQ

How to enroll in health insurance

There are two ways to enroll in a health insurance plan with Independence Blue Cross (IBX) – if you aren’t already enrolled in one. The first is through Open Enrollment; the second is through Special Enrollment – which you would take advantage of if you have a qualifying life event.

If you’re currently enrolled in a health insurance plan with IBX and would like to renew or make changes to your coverage, Open Enrollment is the best time to do so but you don’t have to wait for Open Enrollment to make changes if you have a qualifying life event.

Open Enrollment information

If you don’t have health insurance, Open Enrollment is the time to apply. If you do have health insurance – but want to shop and compare other health insurance options that might better fit your needs and budget, Open Enrollment is a great time to make a change.

Learn more about Open Enrollment

Special Enrollment period information

The Special Enrollment period (SEP) is a period of time outside of the Open Enrollment period during which you may be eligible to apply for an individual or family health plan. If you experience a qualifying life event, such as getting married, having or adopting a baby, losing your coverage, or permanently moving into a new service area, you may qualify for SEP.

Learn more about the Special Enrollment period

content: Employer health plans Employer portal .fragment_51260 { } Plans for every size, business, and budget We serve businesses nationwide, including large and small groups, offering medical, dental, vision, pharmacy benefits, as well as Medicare Advantage and Medicare supplemental plans. Additionally, we provide cost-effective third-party administration (TPA) solutions for self-funded organizations. Learn about our employer health plans Small business Start here if you have 2‑50 employees. Find details about medical, pharmacy, vision, dental, spending accounts, and more. Learn more Large business Start here if you have 51+ employees. Find details about medical, pharmacy, vision, dental, spending accounts, and other benefits. Learn more Third-party administration Start here if you have a self-funded plan through Independence Administrators. Find details about pharmacy, vision, spending accounts, and other benefits. Learn more Employer resources From online account management tools to workplace well-being programs, find what you need to make health care easier. Learn more Advancing health care for all Improving care in every community Working with hospitals and doctors to improve the quality and affordability of care Learn more Personalizing the employee care experience Supporting and engaging members in their care Learn more Elevating whole-person health Providing an integrated range of solutions for every employee's full health: mental, physical, and emotional Learn more Tailored health plan solutions A variety of plans and benefits to meet your employee’s needs Learn more IBX Insights for employers Find resources, tools, and blogs for employers at IBX Insights . title: Health insurance for small business | Independence Blue Cross (IBX)
content: Small business .fragment_51264 { } Small business health insurance When it comes to caring for the people of the Philadelphia region, Independence Blue Cross (IBX) has been here from the very beginning. Building the strongest network of doctors and hospitals, cultivating the highest quality of care, supporting the whole person, and making sure care is affordable and accessible to all. We’re committed to continuing to accelerate how health care is delivered for all our members and customers. Our Blue Solutions ® health plans provide cost-effective coverage and help empower your employees to stay healthier and save money on their health care. View the 2025 Small Business Benefits brochure Get a detailed look at all the benefits available to organizations like yours — in one convenient document. Download brochure Download digital flipbook Comprehensive medical plans including pharmacy and vision Our comprehensive small business ACA-compliant medical plans include benefits for prescription drugs, pediatric dental, and pediatric and adult vision, while giving your employees access to an extensive provider network. Learn more Independence Blue Cross Dental Our new Independence Blue Cross (IBX) Dental portfolio provides a variety of affordable plans with a robust network, low out-of-pocket costs, and value-added savings from the brand you know and trust. Learn more Medicare Let us help take the work out of transitioning your employees into a healthy retirement with group, individual, and exchange options. Learn more Spending accounts Help your employees feel financially secure. With tax advantages for you and your employees, spending accounts (HSA and HRA) are a smart addition to your health plan offerings. Learn more Additional workplace benefits Build a more comprehensive health benefits solution with industry-leading products that provide a holistic approach to managing your employees’ health and wealth. Learn more Behavioral health solutions A member’s mental and physical health are equally important to their overall health. That’s why we offer an enhanced behavioral health experience for our members, with access to more and varied providers. Our integrated approach to behavioral health care ensures your employees receive personalized support connecting them to the right care and resources, in-person or virtually, leading to better outcomes and more informed, empowered decision-making. Learn more Focused care We offer solutions that go beyond medical benefits. Our programs, tools, and services give members the extra support they need to live their best lives. Learn more .fragment_51983 { }
meta_description: Learn more about Independence Blue Cross health insurance plans for members who are covered through a small employer (50 or fewer employees).

Small business

Small business health insurance

When it comes to caring for the people of the Philadelphia region, Independence Blue Cross (IBX) has been here from the very beginning. Building the strongest network of doctors and hospitals, cultivating the highest quality of care, supporting the whole person, and making sure care is affordable and accessible to all. We’re committed to continuing to accelerate how health care is delivered for all our members and customers. Our Blue Solutions® health plans provide cost-effective coverage and help empower your employees to stay healthier and save money on their health care.

View the 2025 Small Business Benefits brochure

Get a detailed look at all the benefits available to organizations like yours — in one convenient document.

Download brochure

Download digital flipbook

Comprehensive medical plans including pharmacy and vision

Our comprehensive small business ACA-compliant medical plans include benefits for prescription drugs, pediatric dental, and pediatric and adult vision, while giving your employees access to an extensive provider network.

Learn more

Independence Blue Cross Dental

Our new Independence Blue Cross (IBX) Dental portfolio provides a variety of affordable plans with a robust network, low out-of-pocket costs, and value-added savings from the brand you know and trust.

Learn more

Medicare

Let us help take the work out of transitioning your employees into a healthy retirement with group, individual, and exchange options.

Learn more

Spending accounts

Help your employees feel financially secure. With tax advantages for you and your employees, spending accounts (HSA and HRA) are a smart addition to your health plan offerings.

Learn more

Additional workplace benefits

Build a more comprehensive health benefits solution with industry-leading products that provide a holistic approach to managing your employees’ health and wealth.

Learn more

Behavioral health solutions

A member’s mental and physical health are equally important to their overall health. That’s why we offer an enhanced behavioral health experience for our members, with access to more and varied providers. Our integrated approach to behavioral health care ensures your employees receive personalized support connecting them to the right care and resources, in-person or virtually, leading to better outcomes and more informed, empowered decision-making.

Learn more

Focused care

We offer solutions that go beyond medical benefits. Our programs, tools, and services give members the extra support they need to live their best lives.

Learn more

Large business

Large business health insurance

When you choose Independence Blue Cross (IBX), you’re choosing a company fully committed to investing in the people and communities we serve. We’ve created programs you can count on and relationships you can believe in. We’re proud to serve you, your business, and your employees.

View the 2026 Large Business Benefits brochure

Get a detailed look at all the benefits available to organizations like yours — in one convenient document.

Download brochure

Download digital flipbook

Medical

We give your employees access to an extensive provider network and empower them to make healthy lifestyle choices with tools, reimbursements, and discounts.

Learn more

Pharmacy

When you combine IBX medical and prescription drug benefits, we can help you lower costs and simplify health care plan management.

Learn more

Independence Blue Cross Dental

Our affordable and comprehensive dental coverage encourages prevention, early diagnosis, and treatment, and can help detect serious medical conditions.

Learn more

Vision

Our vision benefits can help detect more serious health conditions in your employees, while providing them with high quality vision care.

Learn more

Medicare

Let us help take the work out of transitioning your employees into a healthy retirement with group, individual, and exchange options.

Learn more

Vistia Health

Vistia Health reduces the complexity of health care through care coordination and navigation solutions that guide and support consumers on their journey to whole health while lowering costs and increasing satisfaction.

Learn more

Stop loss

Stop loss insurance from Sun Life Assurance Company of Canada helps self-funded employers guard their financial health from the cost impact of catastrophic health claims.

Learn more

Spending accounts

Spending accounts (FSA, HRA, HSA) can help your employees feel financially secure and provide tax advantages for you and for your employees.1

Learn more

Additional workplace benefits

We offer a range of valuable benefit plans, including life, disability, hospital indemnity, international health insurance, and more.

Learn more

Behavioral health solutions

We take an integrated approach to behavioral health. Your employees receive personalized support connecting them to the right care and resources, leading to better outcomes and more informed, empowered decision-making.

Learn more

Focused care

Some of our offerings go beyond medical benefits, such as value-add programs, tools, and services that provide members with the extra support they need to live their best lives.

Learn more

Labor

IBX covers 99 percent of all union workers in southeastern Pennsylvania and we’re proud to meet their unique needs.

Learn more

Educational institutions

IBX is the health insurer of choice for school districts in southeastern Pennsylvania, as well as most of the region’s colleges and universities.

Learn more

1 See IRS Publication 96 for more information.

content: Third-party administration .fragment_416459 { } Third-party administration Independence Administrators helps large and mid-size organizations manage self-funded health benefit plans. With access to the Blue network — one of the largest provider networks in the country — and innovative programs that emphasize value and coordination of care, we build strategic relationships that help our customers not only prepare for the future of health care but capitalize on it. We offer a comprehensive, yet tailored, client-first approach to self-funded health plans. We’ll help you understand compliance requirements specific to your business, so you can build a package that helps protect your company and plan members as well as optimizes your investment. View the Independence Administrators 2026 Tools, Programs, and Resources brochure Get a detailed look at all the benefits available to organizations like yours — in one convenient document. View brochure Pharmacy Effective pharmacy benefit management — when coupled with a medical plan — can help improve population health and achieve significant cost savings. Learn more Vision We offer vision care coverage through Davis Vision, a leader in vision care solutions. Davis Vision provides access to a national provider network with an emphasis on value, high quality, and choice. 1 Learn more Stop loss Stop loss insurance from Sun Life Assurance Company of Canada helps self-funded employers guard their financial health from the cost impact of catastrophic health claims. Learn more Spending accounts Add value — and potential tax savings — to your health benefits plan by offering health savings accounts or flexible spending accounts for qualified medical, dependent care, or parking and transit expenses. Tax-advantaged accounts are available to organizations that have a self-funded health plan administered by Independence Administrators.* 2 Learn more Behavioral health solutions We take an integrated approach to behavioral health. Your employees receive personalized support connecting them to the right care and resources, leading to better outcomes and more informed, empowered decision-making. Learn more Focused care Some of our offerings go beyond medical benefits, such as value-add programs, tools, and services that provide members with the extra support they need to live their best lives. Learn more International travel health plans Get peace of mind for short or extended trips abroad with an international health insurance plan. Learn more * See IRS publication 969 for more information . 1 Vision program administered by Davis Vision, an independent company. 2 HealthEquity, an independent company, provides Health Savings Account administrative services for Independence Administrators. Investments available to HSA holders are subject to risk, including the possible loss of the principal invested and are not FDIC insured or guaranteed by HealthEquity. HSA holders making investments should review the applicable fund’s prospectus. HealthEquity does not provide tax, legal, financial or medical advice. Third-party administration

Independence Administrators helps large and mid-size organizations manage self-funded health benefit plans. With access to the Blue network — one of the largest provider networks in the country — and innovative programs that emphasize value and coordination of care, we build strategic relationships that help our customers not only prepare for the future of health care but capitalize on it.

We offer a comprehensive, yet tailored, client-first approach to self-funded health plans. We’ll help you understand compliance requirements specific to your business, so you can build a package that helps protect your company and plan members as well as optimizes your investment.

View the Independence Administrators 2026 Tools, Programs, and Resources brochure

Get a detailed look at all the benefits available to organizations like yours — in one convenient document.

View brochure

Pharmacy

Effective pharmacy benefit management — when coupled with a medical plan — can help improve population health and achieve significant cost savings.

Learn more

Vision

We offer vision care coverage through Davis Vision, a leader in vision care solutions. Davis Vision provides access to a national provider network with an emphasis on value, high quality, and choice.1

Learn more

Stop loss

Stop loss insurance from Sun Life Assurance Company of Canada helps self-funded employers guard their financial health from the cost impact of catastrophic health claims.

Learn more

Spending accounts

Add value — and potential tax savings — to your health benefits plan by offering health savings accounts or flexible spending accounts for qualified medical, dependent care, or parking and transit expenses. Tax-advantaged accounts are available to organizations that have a self-funded health plan administered by Independence Administrators.*2

Learn more

Behavioral health solutions

We take an integrated approach to behavioral health. Your employees receive personalized support connecting them to the right care and resources, leading to better outcomes and more informed, empowered decision-making.

Learn more

Focused care

Some of our offerings go beyond medical benefits, such as value-add programs, tools, and services that provide members with the extra support they need to live their best lives.

Learn more

International travel health plans

Get peace of mind for short or extended trips abroad with an international health insurance plan.

content: Why IBX for business? .fragment_51353 { } Why choose us? Advancing health care for all You want health care coverage that's effective, affordable, and simple. Employers choose Independence Blue Cross (IBX) not only because we’re the leading health insurance company in the Philadelphia area. But because we also develop innovative products and solutions that lower costs and improve health outcomes. We’re proud to deliver access to quality care and top providers and facilities, while making a difference in our members’ lives and in the communities we serve. Why IBX for business?

Why choose us?

Advancing health care for all

You want health care coverage that's effective, affordable, and simple. Employers choose Independence Blue Cross (IBX) not only because we’re the leading health insurance company in the Philadelphia area. But because we also develop innovative products and solutions that lower costs and improve health outcomes. We’re proud to deliver access to quality care and top providers and facilities, while making a difference in our members’ lives and in the communities we serve.

Improving care in every community

Working with hospitals and doctors to improve the quality and affordability of care

Learn more

Personalizing the employee care experience

Supporting and engaging members in their care

Learn more

Elevating whole-person health

Providing an integrated range of solutions for every employee's full health: mental, physical, and emotional

Learn more

Tailored health plan solutions

Working with customers to design the perfect solution that meets their needs and the needs of their employees

Learn more
